tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE farm_info (
    farm_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    farm_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    certification VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE crop_info (
    crop_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    crop_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    crop_type VARCHAR(50),
    farm_id INT REFERENCES farm_info(farm_id),
    harvest_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE certification_info (
    certification_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    certification_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    certification_body VARCHAR(255),
    validity_period INT
)

CREATE TABLE farm_to_table (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    restaurant_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    farm_id INT REFERENCES farm_info(farm_id),
    certification_id INT REFERENCES certification_info(certification_id),
    transaction_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE employee_info (
    employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    role VARCHAR(50),
    farm_id INT REFERENCES farm_info(farm_id),
    certification_id INT REFERENCES certification_info(certification_id)
)
